name: Sustainable urban transport - delivering the promise
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Three distinguished speakers on sustainable urban transport offer clarity on what is going on and what needs to happen next if we are to achieve the goal of truly sustainable urban transport.

presentations.name: The Freiburg model: why do we talk about sustainable urban transport and they just do it?
presentations.speakers: Professor John Whitelegg, Director, Eco-logica, Visiting Professor of Sustainable Transport, Liverpool John Moores University and Professor of Sustainable Development at the Stockholm Environment Institute, University of York

presentations.name: Hypermobility or sustainable mobility: getting to where we want to go
presentations.speakers: Professor John Adams, University College London

presentations.name: Delivering the zero carbon transport future
presentations.speakers: Dr Mayer Hillman, Policy Studies Institute, London
